name: Labyrinth (itch) (NextDayAir)
description:
A game made in 48 hours for Kenney Jam 2021. The theme was "rotation". Click and drag to rotate the world and roll the ball to the purple jewel. If you get stuck you can press space or right click to reset the stage. There are three stages.

Everything is from Kenney except the music, which is Cake Town from OpenGameArt.org. The only asset I modified is the texture for the ball, where I made the white lines thicker.
